title: Trio: Mindful Todo List App
description:
Trio is a productivity tool that helps you get more done without feeling overwhelmed. It’s designed to help you focus on the three most important tasks each day, so you can make progress without sacrificing your well-being.

Key features:
- Morning reminders to plan intentionally
- Evening reflections to appreciate progress
- Mindful reminders to take breaks and recharge

Trio is your partner in sustainable success. It’ll help you focus, protect your mental health, and make consistent progress.
